mapper.select: select id, name, birth, email, phone, gender, schoolAbility, question, answer, point, grade, img, sumLike, delCheck from user_table order by sumLike desc
select id, name, birth, email, phone, gender, schoolability, question, answer, point, grade, img, sumlike from user_table where id = #{id}

select a.charge as "charge", a.withdraw as "withdraw", a.regdate as "regdate", a.userid as "userid.id", b.point as "userid.point" from point_table a, user_table b where a.userid = b.id order by a.regdate desc
select no, title, userid, img, price, regdate, avglike, hits from product_table order by regdate desc

select a.no as "no", a.regdate as "regdate", a.buycheck as "buycheck", a.productno as "productNo.no", b.price as "productNo.price", c.id as "userid.id" from order_table a, product_table b, user_table c where a.userid = c.id and a.productno = b.no order by a.regdate desc

select to_char(regdate,'mm/dd') as "regdate", count(no) as "count" from product_table where regdate >= (sysdate-7) and regdate < sysdate group by to_char(regdate, 'mm/dd') order by to_char(regdate, 'mm/dd')

select to_char(regdate,'mm/dd') as "regdate", count(no) as "count" from order_table where regdate >= (sysdate-7) and regdate < sysdate and buycheck = 'Y' group by to_char(regdate, 'mm/dd') order by to_char(regdate, 'mm/dd')
